languages.text: {n}Паскаль взирает на женщину равнодушно и с легкой брезгливостью. Кажется, ему и в голову не пришло, что на слова этого существа допустимо вообще хоть что-то ответить.{/n}
{n}Pasqal stares dispassionately at Reta with a hint of disgust. Evidently, he has not even considered the possibility that replying to this creature's words could be anything other than heresy.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль взирает на женщину равнодушно и с легкой брезгливостью. Кажется, ему и в голову не пришло, что на слова этого существа допустимо вообще хоть что-то ответить.{/n}

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡冷漠地盯着蕾塔，表情中带着一丝厌恶。很显然，他根本没有考虑过这种可能性——眼前的这个女人说出的话，或许未必就是异端邪说。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal stares dispassionately at Reta with a hint of disgust. Evidently, he has not even considered the possibility that replying to this creature's words could be anything other than heresy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡冷漠地盯着蕾塔，表情中带着一丝厌恶。很显然，他根本没有考虑过这种可能性——眼前的这个女人说出的话，或许未必就是异端邪说。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal observa a Reta sin mostrar más emoción que una pizca de aversión. Es evidente que cree que responder a esta criatura solo puede constituir una herejía.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal stares dispassionately at Reta with a hint of disgust. Evidently, he has not even considered the possibility that replying to this creature's words could be anything other than heresy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal observa a Reta sin mostrar más emoción que una pizca de aversión. Es evidente que cree que responder a esta criatura solo puede constituir una herejía.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルはほのかな嫌悪感を込めて、冷たくレタを見つめる。明らかに、彼はこのクリーチャーの言葉に対する返答が異端以外の何かである可能性さえ考えていない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal stares dispassionately at Reta with a hint of disgust. Evidently, he has not even considered the possibility that replying to this creature's words could be anything other than heresy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルはほのかな嫌悪感を込めて、冷たくレタを見つめる。明らかに、彼はこのクリーチャーの言葉に対する返答が異端以外の何かである可能性さえ考えていない。{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal starrt Reta emotionslos und leicht angewidert an. Er hat offensichtlich nicht einmal die Möglichkeit erwogen, eine Antwort auf die Worte dieser Kreatur könnte irgendetwas anderes sein als Ketzerei.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal stares dispassionately at Reta with a hint of disgust. Evidently, he has not even considered the possibility that replying to this creature's words could be anything other than heresy.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal starrt Reta emotionslos und leicht angewidert an. Er hat offensichtlich nicht einmal die Möglichkeit erwogen, eine Antwort auf die Worte dieser Kreatur könnte irgendetwas anderes sein als Ketzerei.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal dévisage Réta avec un soupçon de dégoût dans son regard. De toute évidence, il estime que le simple fait de répondre aux paroles de cette créature relèverait de l'hérésie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal stares dispassionately at Reta with a hint of disgust. Evidently, he has not even considered the possibility that replying to this creature's words could be anything other than heresy.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, Reta'ya hafif bir tiksinti ve soğukkanlılıkla bakıyor. Belli ki bu yaratığın sözlerine yanıt vermenin ancak kâfirlik olacağı sonucuna varmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal stares dispassionately at Reta with a hint of disgust. Evidently, he has not even considered the possibility that replying to this creature's words could be anything other than heresy.{/n}
